statements.select:
DECLARE @RecordCount INT DECLARE @TotalInventoryQty DECIMAL(18, 2) DECLARE @TotalInventoryAmount DECIMAL(18, 2)
SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(Temp.OrgID) , @TotalInventoryQty = SUM(Temp.InventoryQty) , @TotalInventoryAmount = SUM(Temp.InventoryAmount) FROM ( SELECT T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' , T2.InventoryQty 'WarehouseQty' , T2.InventoryAmount 'WarehouseAmount' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryQty = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) / T2.InventoryQty * 100) END 'InventoryQtyPercent' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryAmount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) / T2.InventoryAmount * 100) END 'InventoryAmountPercent' FROM ( SELECT T11.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T12.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T11.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T13.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T11.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T11.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T11.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T11.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T11 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T12 ON T12.Org_ID = T11.INV_Org_ID AND T12.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T13 ON T13.WH_ID = T11.INV_WH_ID AND T13.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T11.INV_IsValid = 1
T11.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T11.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T11.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T11.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T11.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM ( SELECT T211.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T212.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T211.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T213.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T211.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T211.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T211.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T211.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T211 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T212 ON T212.Org_ID = T211.INV_Org_ID AND T212.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T213 ON T213.WH_ID = T211.INV_WH_ID AND T213.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T211.INV_IsValid = 1
T211.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T211.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T211.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T211.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T211.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T21 GROUP BY T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName ) T2 ON T2.OrgID = T1.OrgID AND T2.WarehouseID = T1.WarehouseID GROUP BY T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , T2.InventoryQty , T2.InventoryAmount ) Temp
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , @TotalInventoryQty 'TotalInventoryQty' , @TotalInventoryAmount 'TotalInventoryAmount' , T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' , T2.InventoryQty 'WarehouseQty' , T2.InventoryAmount 'WarehouseAmount' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryQty = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) / T2.InventoryQty * 100) END 'InventoryQtyPercent' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryAmount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) / T2.InventoryAmount * 100) END 'InventoryAmountPercent' FROM ( SELECT T11.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T12.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T11.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T13.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T11.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T11.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T11.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T11.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T11 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T12 ON T12.Org_ID = T11.INV_Org_ID AND T12.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T13 ON T13.WH_ID = T11.INV_WH_ID AND T13.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T11.INV_IsValid = 1
T11.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T11.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T11.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T11.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T11.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM ( SELECT T211.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T212.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T211.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T213.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T211.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T211.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T211.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T211.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T211 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T212 ON T212.Org_ID = T211.INV_Org_ID AND T212.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T213 ON T213.WH_ID = T211.INV_WH_ID AND T213.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T211.INV_IsValid = 1
T211.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T211.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T211.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T211.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T211.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T21 GROUP BY T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName ) T2 ON T2.OrgID = T1.OrgID AND T2.WarehouseID = T1.WarehouseID GROUP BY T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , T2.InventoryQty , T2.InventoryAmount ORDER BY T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

DECLARE @RecordCount INT DECLARE @TotalInventoryQty DECIMAL(18, 2) DECLARE @TotalInventoryAmount DECIMAL(18, 2)
SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(Temp.OrgID) , @TotalInventoryQty = SUM(Temp.InventoryQty) , @TotalInventoryAmount = SUM(Temp.InventoryAmount) FROM ( SELECT T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' , T2.InventoryQty 'WarehouseQty' , T2.InventoryAmount 'WarehouseAmount' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryQty = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) / T2.InventoryQty * 100) END 'InventoryQtyPercent' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryAmount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) / T2.InventoryAmount * 100) END 'InventoryAmountPercent' FROM ( SELECT T11.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T12.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T11.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T13.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T11.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T11.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T11.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T11.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T11 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T12 ON T12.Org_ID = T11.INV_Org_ID AND T12.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T13 ON T13.WH_ID = T11.INV_WH_ID AND T13.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T11.INV_IsValid = 1
T11.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T11.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T11.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T11.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T11.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM ( SELECT T211.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T212.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T211.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T213.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T211.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T211.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T211.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T211.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T211 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T212 ON T212.Org_ID = T211.INV_Org_ID AND T212.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T213 ON T213.WH_ID = T211.INV_WH_ID AND T213.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T211.INV_IsValid = 1
T211.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T211.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T211.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T211.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T211.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T21 GROUP BY T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName ) T2 ON T2.OrgID = T1.OrgID AND T2.WarehouseID = T1.WarehouseID GROUP BY T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , T2.InventoryQty , T2.InventoryAmount ) Temp
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , @TotalInventoryQty 'TotalInventoryQty' , @TotalInventoryAmount 'TotalInventoryAmount' , T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , T1.AutoPartsBrand , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' , T2.InventoryQty 'WarehouseQty' , T2.InventoryAmount 'WarehouseAmount' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryQty = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryQty, 0)) / T2.InventoryQty * 100) END 'InventoryQtyPercent' , CASE WHEN T2.InventoryAmount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), SUM(ISNULL(T1.InventoryAmount, 0)) / T2.InventoryAmount * 100) END 'InventoryAmountPercent' FROM ( SELECT T11.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T12.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T11.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T13.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T11.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , T14.APA_Brand 'AutoPartsBrand' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T11.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T11.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T11.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T11 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T12 ON T12.Org_ID = T11.INV_Org_ID AND T12.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T13 ON T13.WH_ID = T11.INV_WH_ID AND T13.WH_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsArchive T14 ON T14.APA_Barcode = T11.INV_Barcode AND T14.APA_IsValid = 1 WHERE T11.INV_IsValid = 1
T11.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T11.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T11.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T11.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T11.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryQty, 0)) 'InventoryQty' , SUM(ISNULL(T21.InventoryAmount, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM ( SELECT T211.INV_Org_ID 'OrgID' , T212.Org_ShortName 'OrgShortName' , T211.INV_WH_ID 'WarehouseID' , T213.WH_Name 'WarehouseName' , T211.INV_Name 'AutoPartsName' , T214.APA_Brand 'AutoPartsBrand' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T211.INV_Qty) 'InventoryQty' , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T211.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T211.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T211 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T212 ON T212.Org_ID = T211.INV_Org_ID AND T212.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T213 ON T213.WH_ID = T211.INV_WH_ID AND T213.WH_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsArchive T214 ON T214.APA_Barcode = T211.INV_Barcode AND T214.APA_IsValid = 1 WHERE T211.INV_IsValid = 1
T211.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T211.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T211.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T211.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T211.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) T21 GROUP BY T21.OrgID , T21.OrgShortName , T21.WarehouseID , T21.WarehouseName ) T2 ON T2.OrgID = T1.OrgID AND T2.WarehouseID = T1.WarehouseID GROUP BY T1.OrgID , T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseID , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName , T1.AutoPartsBrand , T2.InventoryQty , T2.InventoryAmount ORDER BY T1.OrgShortName , T1.WarehouseName , T1.AutoPartsName
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

DECLARE @RecordCount INT DECLARE @TotalInventoryQty DECIMAL(18, 2) DECLARE @TotalInventoryAmount DECIMAL(18, 2)
SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(Temp.INV_ID) , @TotalInventoryQty = SUM(Temp.INV_Qty) , @TotalInventoryAmount = SUM(Temp.InventoryAmount) FROM ( SELECT T1.INV_ID , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T1.INV_Qty) 'INV_Qty' , T1.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T1.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T1.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' FROM PIS_Inventory T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.INV_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsArchive T3 ON T3.APA_Barcode = T1.INV_Barcode AND T3.APA_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T4 ON T4.WH_ID = T1.INV_WH_ID AND T4.WH_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T5 ON T5.WHB_ID = T1.INV_WHB_ID AND T5.WHB_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T6 ON T6.SUPP_ID = T1.INV_SUPP_ID AND T6.SUPP_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.INV_IsValid = 1
T1.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T1.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T1.INV_Name LIKE '%'+#AutoPartsName#+'%'
T3.APA_Brand LIKE '%'+#AutoPartsBrand#+'%'
T1.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T1.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T1.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
) Temp
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , @TotalInventoryQty 'TotalInventoryQty' , @TotalInventoryAmount 'TotalInventoryAmount' , T1.INV_Org_ID , T1.INV_WH_ID , T1.INV_WHB_ID , T1.INV_ThirdNo , T1.INV_OEMNo , T1.INV_Barcode , T1.INV_BatchNo , T1.INV_Name , T1.INV_Specification , T1.INV_SUPP_ID , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), T1.INV_Qty) 'INV_Qty' , T1.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice , CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), ISNULL(T1.INV_Qty, 0) * ISNULL(T1.INV_PurchaseUnitPrice, 0)) 'InventoryAmount' , T1.INV_CreatedBy , T1.INV_CreatedTime , T2.Org_ShortName , T3.APA_Brand , T3.APA_UOM , T3.APA_Level , T3.APA_VehicleBrand , T3.APA_VehicleInspire , T3.APA_VehicleCapacity , T3.APA_VehicleYearModel , T3.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeCode , T3.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeName , T3.APA_VehicleModelCode , T3.APA_ExchangeCode , T4.WH_Name , T5.WHB_Name , T6.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_Inventory T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.INV_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsArchive T3 ON T3.APA_Barcode = T1.INV_Barcode AND T3.APA_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T4 ON T4.WH_ID = T1.INV_WH_ID AND T4.WH_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T5 ON T5.WHB_ID = T1.INV_WHB_ID AND T5.WHB_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T6 ON T6.SUPP_ID = T1.INV_SUPP_ID AND T6.SUPP_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.INV_IsValid = 1
T1.INV_Org_ID = #OrgID#
T1.INV_WH_ID =#WarehouseID#
T1.INV_Name LIKE '%'+#AutoPartsName#+'%'
T3.APA_Brand LIKE '%'+#AutoPartsBrand#+'%'
T1.INV_CreatedTime BETWEEN #StockInTimeStart# AND #StockInTimeEnd# T1.INV_CreatedTime >= #StockInTimeStart#
T1.INV_CreatedTime <= #StockInTimeEnd#
ORDER BY T2.Org_ShortName , T1.INV_Name , T1.INV_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
